questions.question: This tree has haunted shoppers of Mic Mac Mall in Dartmouth since 1983.
questions.answer: Who is Woody the talking Christmas Tree?

questions.question: Each year, this American city receives a Christmas Tree in thanks for support provided after the Halifax Explosion.
This county claims fame as the Balsam Fir Christmas Tree Capital of the World.
In the heart of Cape Breton, this island is home to just 300 residents. Yet it receives thousands of seasonal packages each year.
This is the first ghost to appear in A Christmas Carol.
This lead singer of the band The Wailers died at the Cedars Of Lebanon Hospital on May 11, 1981.
This film featuring Owen Wilson and Jennifer Aniston was released on Christmas Day, 2008.

This actress can be seen here wishing a Happy Hanukkah in American Sign Language in this video: </br> <iframe src='https://twitter.com/hashtag/HappyHanukkah?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw' height='200' width='300' title='Embedded tweet of (redacted) saying Happy HappyHanukkah in ASL.'></iframe>
